pros: Work can be interesting depending on what team you're in. Generous with PTO, Federal holidays.
cons: Low pay, no career growth

title: Nothing to say really about it.

title: Good enough

title: Good Place
pros: Working here was good. The benefits, vacation are great here. The management is nice. you are constantly busy which like and it is a billion dollar company so you know your job isn't going anywhere unless if you perform poor and the pay is good.
cons: -old technology that needs to be upgraded -gossipy people at the time I was working however I believe there has been a huge turnover lately. -not much of an opportunity to advance in long term for career -work/life balance poor

title: Good Benefits, but be careful
pros: Some of the best benefits in the industry. 3 weeks PTO, 100% 410k match up to 6%, 50% match up to 9%. Employer pays a significant portion of the insurance costs. Excellent insurance options.
cons: Very cliquish and a pervasive culture of fear. There is was a persistent culture of fear the entire time I worked there. A new leadership regime would come in and cull a good number of employees for "their guys"

title: Be aware of new management regime
pros: Great benefits, generous PTO and equinox gym discount
cons: Property management is probably the worst department to work for in this company. New management came in and bringing all his goonies in. Stay away!

title: Senior Associates
pros: Excellent benefits in all aspects ( medical, vacation, )
cons: Worked long hours, no motivation for growth, lower salary compensation in compares with the market,power is controlled by small amount of people, toxic environment. Leaders like to play with the feeling of their subordinates.

title: Great Company
pros: If you are ambitious and not afraid to speak up, you will get noticed.
cons: There are certain styles to senior leadership, and it's important to "speak up" the right way.

title: Security Officer
pros: Small environment, non-contracted security, Union and Medical Benefits.
cons: Far from home. commute is very long to and from work.

title: Great
pros: Great company to work for filled with very smart individuals
cons: Cant say anything bad, overall great experience working at Paramount Group

title: Review
pros: Nice people for the most part
cons: Don't promote long time employees, don't promote from within.

title: Long hours
pros: It is difficult to recall
cons: Hectic environment, numerous projects, no clear instructions

title: Great company
pros: Super nice company with great structure

title: AVOID AT ALL COSTS
pros: None. Literally no pros at all.

title: Terrible place for women

title: Poor Salary
pros: Excellent medical and transportation benefits.
cons: Full-time employee for over 4 years and still earning a very low income by New York City living standards.
